Metadata.Title: CIA Kill Order
Metadata.Description: The CIA and DEA have uncovered the Ringleader of the largest South American drug cartel in the world, Rico Delgado. The American Government has contracted the ICA to assassinate Delgado, as well as a local drug dealer who is going to meet with him, as well as some of Delgado's undercover agents. Be advised that the drug dealer is going to meet with Delgado, and you might be able to use this to your advantage. Happy Hunting, 47.
